analysis.key_quote: I oppose this proposed rule. First, it is illegal under the Civil Service Reform Act. Second, it runs the risk of creating an entire civil service beholden to the President, rather than to the rule of law or the mission of the agency they serve.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, citing legal concerns and the potential for politicization of the civil service, which aligns with themes of merit-based systems and due process protections.
